note.original: te (sī. syā.), naṃ (sī. syā. pī. aṭṭha.), taṃ (ka. aṭṭha.)

note.previous: Eko ca tattha sakuṇo, yo nesaṃ
Puṭṭho me samma akkhāhi, kuhiṃ sāliṃ nidāhasi
Lakkhī vata me udapādi ajja, yo addasāsiṃ pavaraṃ
So kosiyo attamano udaggo, annañca pānañcabhisaṅkharitvā

note.original: lohitamadena majjāmi; vijahāmi jīvitaṃ pāṇā, (sī. pī. aṭṭha.)
lohitamadena majjāmi; vijahāmi jīvitaṃ pāṇā, (sī. pī. aṭṭha.)
osadhi (sī. syā. pī.), osaṭṭhi (ka.), osati (abhinavaṭīkā), osīdati (?)
vassaṃva sare pāde (sī.), vassaṃva sare pabbatapāde (pī.)

note.previous: Yo kimpurisaṃ avadhi, adūsakaṃ mayha kāmā hi
Mama tvaṃ hehisi bhariyā, rājakule pūjitā nārībhi
Tattheva taṃ apassantī, kimpurisa kathaṃ ahaṃ kassaṃ
Pajā mamaṃ khādituṃ patthayanti, luddā cilācā
Mittaṃ sahāyañca karonti paṇḍitā, kāle akāle sukhamesamānā
Yaṃ hoti kiccaṃ anukampakena, ariyassa ariyena kataṃ tayīdaṃ
hi tāta satamesa dhammo, putto pitu yaṃ care

note.original: yeme japanti (sī. pī.), ye’me jappanti mante (jā. 1.6.10)

note.previous: Sahassavedopi na taṃ paṭicca, dukkhā pamucce

note.original: na tesaṃ jātiṃ pucchanti (sī. syā. pī.), na tesaṃ jāti sujjhati (ka.)

note.previous: Āvāsiko hotu mahāvihāre, navakammiko hotu gajaṅgalāyaṃ
Agāramajjhe maraṇaṃ upetu, yo vā bhonto saṅkati kañcideva

note.original: aṭṭhaṅgasusamāhitaṃ (sabbattha) vi. va. 129 pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathā passitabbā

note.previous: Nānābhavā vippayogena tassā, manomayaṃ vedana vedayāmi
So maṃ akkami taṃ kupito aḍaṃsi, dukkhābhituṇṇo maraṇaṃ upāgā
Khudaṃ pipāsaṃ adhivāsayanto, kasmā bhavaṃposathiko siṅgāla
kucchiṃ mahato gajassa, kuṇape rato hatthimaṃsesu giddho
Na me ayaṃ tuyha vadhāya ajja, samāhito cāpadhure
Te maṃ samaggā hiṃseyyuṃ, tasmā nesaṃ na patthaye
Te ca tattha nisīditvā, tassa rukkhassa chāyayā

note.original: siṅgiṃ bidalasūpiyo (sī. pī.), siṅgīveraṃ lasūpiyo (ka.) siṅgīnti siṅgīverādikaṃ uttaribhaṅgaṃ; vidalasūpiyoti muggasūpādayo (aṭṭha.) vidalaṃ kalāyādimhi vattatīti sakkatābhidhāne

note.previous: Kāsikāni ca vatthāni, uddiyāni ca kambalā
Ete hanatha bandhatha, mā vo muñcittha
So dāni ajja na ramāmi sagge, āyuṃ nu khīṇo
puññāni parittakāni, yesaṃ vipākaṃ idha vedayittho

note.original: te ārāmā te vana’me pacārā (sī. pī.), te yeva ārāmavanāni sañcarā (ka.)

note.previous: Virate methunā dhammā, ye me bhuñjeyyu

note.original: vāmamhi ca vanamhi ca (sī. pī.), gāmamhi nigamamhi vā (syā.)
note.previous: Nādinne vuṭṭhahissāma, gāmamhi vā vanamhi vā
Aññe dhanassa kāmā hi, heṭṭhāmañce pasakkitā
Taṃ tvaṃ bhattaṃ paṭiggayha, brāhmaṇassa adāsayi
